Quick Install¶

Assuming you had already installed python 3, you can install the Discord bot from the GitHub Release .

Required packages¶

-pip install discord
-pip install chinese_converter
-pip install discord-webhook
-pip install mwclient
-pip install fuzzywuzzy
-pip install flask
-pip install discord-py-slash-command

Create bot account¶

Follow discord.py’s tutorial to create and invite your bot.
The bot will need the following premissions:

WIP

Configure setting.json¶

Blank template as follow:

{
    "TOKEN": "",
    "command_prefix":"",
    "webhook":"",
    "user":"",
    "self":"",
    "watching":"",
    "publish":
}

key

accepting value

type

TOKEN

bot’s token

str

command_prefix

the prefix to raise bot command

str

webhook

webhook address for webhook embed responses

str

user

the nickname for the bot to call users

str

self

the nickname for the bot to call self

str

watching

the status of bot

str

publish

channel ID of self-publishing message sent by sayd command

int
